entry.title: Simulated South Ocean Circulation
entry.content:
Research Scientists and Engineers at the ARC CoE for Climate System Science NCI Vizlab, NOAA/GFDL, Double Precision, CSIRO have released a visualisation of the Southern Ocean circulation.

The dataset was created using MOM5 in a 0.1 degree global configuration.
entry.summary: Research Scientists and Engineers at the ARC CoE for Climate System Science NCI Vizlab, NOAA/GFDL, Double Precision, CSIRO have released a visualisation of the Southern Ocean circulation.

entry.title: Simulated Sea Surface Temperature
entry.content:
Research Scientists and Engineers at the NOAA Geophysical Fluid Dynamics Laboratory have released a visualisation of the World Ocean Sea Surface Temperature.

The dataset was created using the coupled climate model CM2.6, which is based on the ocean model code MOM5 at a 0.1 degree global configuration, coupled to a 50km finite volume atmospheric model.
entry.summary: Research Scientists and Engineers at the NOAA Geophysical Fluid Dynamics Laboratory have released a visualisation of the World Ocean Sea Surface Temperature.
